content: The **Central Singapore Community Development Council** is one of five [Community Development Councils](/wiki/Community_Development_Council) (CDCs) set up across the [Republic of Singapore](/wiki/Republic_of_Singapore) to aid in local administration of governmental policies and schemes. ## Constituencies As of May 2025, the Central Singapore district covers: ### Single Member Constituency (SMC) - [Jalan Kayu SMC](/wiki/Jalan_Kayu_SMC) - [Kebun Baru SMC](/wiki/Kebun_Baru_SMC) - [Marymount SMC](/wiki/Marymount_Single_Member_Constituency) - [Potong Pasir SMC](/wiki/Potong_Pasir_SMC) - [Queenstown SMC](/wiki/Queenstown_SMC) - [Radin Mas SMC](/wiki/Radin_Mas_SMC) - [Yio Chu Kang SMC](/wiki/Yio_Chu_Kang_SMC) ### Group Representation Constituency (GRC) - [Ang Mo Kio GRC](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_GRC) - Ang Mo Kio–Hougang - Cheng San–Seletar - Buangkok Green - Serangoon North - Teck Ghee - [Bishan-Toa Payoh GRC](/wiki/Bishan-Toa_Payoh_GRC) - Bishan East–Sin Ming - Toa Payoh West–Thomson - Toa Payoh Central - Toa Payoh East - [Jalan Besar GRC](/wiki/Jalan_Besar_GRC) - Kampong Glam - Kolam Ayer - Kreta Ayer - Kim Seng - Whampoa - [Tanjong Pagar GRC](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_GRC) - Buona Vista - Henderson - Dawson - Moulmein - Cairnhill - Telok Blangah - Tanjong Pagar - Tiong Bahru ## Mayors The incumbent Mayor of Central Singapore District is MP for [Jalan Besar GRC](/wiki/Jalan_Besar_GRC) [Denise Phua](/wiki/Denise_Phua) from the [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) since 2014. #NameStart of termEnd of termPolitical Party1[Yaacob Ibrahim](/wiki/Yaacob_Ibrahim)1 April 200123 November 2001[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)2[Heng Chee How](/wiki/Heng_Chee_How)24 November 200129 May 20063[Zainudin Nordin](/wiki/Zainudin_Nordin)30 May 200626 May 20114[Sam Tan](/wiki/Sam_Tan_(politician))27 May 201126 May 20145[Denise Phua](/wiki/Denise_Phua)27 May 2014*Incumbent* - title: Central Singapore Community Development Council
